DOC.detailed_description: This study double-blind , randomize , parallel group , proof concept study patient post-traumatic osteoarthritis ( PTOA ) knee . Approximately 124 eligible patient randomize one two treatment group ( 1:1 ) treat single intra-articular ( IA ) injection : - 40 mg FX006 - 40 mg Kenalog®-40 ( triamcinolone acetonide injectable suspension , USP ) Each prospective patient undergo screen evaluation confirm diagnosis PTOA knee concurrence eligibility criterion . Patients treat Day 1 ( Baseline ) return clinic Weeks 4 , 8 12 evaluation safety efficacy .
